title: Interpretation of grass in a dream: Seeing grass in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of grass for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married man and a single young man, green, yellow, long, short, in the garden, at home, in the orchard, planting, sitting, and more according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Hashish: Sustenance for animals and livestock, It is like the money of the world from which every person takes what his Lord has distributed to him and made it his livelihood, and returns his meat, milk, butter, ghee, honey, wool, and hair. And the earth. Seeing green grass in a dream is often associated with a good psychological state. Whoever sees in his dream that he is walking on soft grass, then in his waking life he takes a safe path without obstacles and obstacles. Green plants of any kind are praised in the vision because they are an expression of life, food, fertility, and growth. Green grass in the interpretation indicates contentment and peace of mind. It is praiseworthy in the interpretation to see the sleeper as if he is sitting or sleeping on green grass, because this explains his balanced life and perhaps his well-being. As for the sunken or dense grass called hashish, it explains livelihood for those who work in trade or crafts. Or handicrafts, and grass can represent offspring, pregnancy, and childbirth if it appears in the dream dense or covering a large area. If seeing green grass in a dream leaves a positive impression on the dreamer upon waking up from the dream, then the dreamer can expect a happy or joyful event. Grass is considered The dream is generally a positive symbol unless it is dry, because dry grass in a dream can indicate a lack of financial resources or a lack of opportunities in life. This was a general introduction to the interpretation of seeing grass or weeds in a dream. Below we will try to decode this symbol in depth so that we can express About it accurately and correctly. Interpretation of green grass in one dream: Wet meadows or green grass in a woman’s dream may indicate her ambition or positive vision of life, because green in dream interpretation is the color of optimism. If an unmarried woman sees herself sitting or sleeping on soft green grass This means peace of mind and perhaps her dream heralds a happy life in the future. Wonderful and happy whenever he shows something good that can drown the life of the dreamer in the future. Greenery, water, and plants in general in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate goodness, profit, and benefit, and are praiseworthy in the interpretation. Also, seeing rain falling on the grass and this scene in a dream could be a harbinger of marriage. Interpretation of green grass in a married woman’s dream If a married woman dreams that green grass or weeds surround her house or cover her yard or garden, then this is a very good interpretation. Every plant Green in a dream is an expression of the goodness that an individual sees in the future, and perhaps the color green in a dream represents a year in which there is a lot of goodness and blessing, because a fruitful and good year is generally called the phrase “green year.” It is generally good in interpretation to see a married woman eating Grass or weeds. As for a married woman who sees in her dream that she has a fat cow

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead king in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dead king in a dream is one of the dreams that brings a lot of goodness. Thus, the encyclopedia presents an article on the interpretation of seeing the dead king in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars have found that seeing a dead king in a dream. Convey goodness and blessings to the monarch. And that God Almighty will give him abundant sustenance, and bless him in his life, but they differed in the case that the dreamer saw the dead king in a dream, and in different cases they differed in interpretation. So let's get to know the interpretation of seeing a dead king in a dream.Interpretation of seeing a dead king in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a dead king in a dream In general, the majority of dream interpreters unanimously agreed that seeing a king in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates the upcoming goodness of the pioneer and also indicates tremendous management. Which Almighty God has prepared for him. If someone sees an angel with a happy face in a dream. This indicates the happiness that will accompany this dreamer throughout his life and also shows that Almighty God pleases this person and will take care of him from where he does not expect it. And if someone saw an angel in his sleep, and ate and drank with him, and they sat together; This is evidence that God Almighty will give that person a high status among his companions, and he will leave a good impact after his death. As a result of his achievements in his professional life. If a person sees an angel in his dream, then he is an Arab. This is evidence that this person will reach a job greater than his current job, but if the king he saw in his dream is a foreigner. This is evidence that this person will suffer great injustice at work. Either this injustice is from his colleagues, or from his manager at work. Interpretation of a dream about a dead king according to Ibn Sirin: If one sees in a dream that he is sitting with an angel. This is evidence that Almighty God will give him a lot of money and a lot of sustenance. This is evidence that God Almighty will grant that person a high position in practical life above all his companions and friends, but if it appears that he greets the King without hugging him. This is evidence that God Almighty will give that person the opportunity to travel that will bring him goodness and blessings. But if a person sees in a dream that he is inside the palace of that king or in front of his grave. This is proof that the achievement he has been trying for a long time is; to achieve that; Soon God Almighty will succeed him, whether it is in his work, in his life, or in the pursuit of knowledge if he is a seeker of knowledge. Interpretation of seeing the dead king in a dream according to Ibn ShahinIbn Shaheen interprets seeing the king in a dream as whoever sees that he is sitting with the king in a dream . This is evidence of the fulfillment of all his dreams and desires. It is evidence of the great goodness that God bestows, as it is evidence of the satisfaction of the desires that he dreamed of achieving. If the fortuneteller is sick; This is good news from God Almighty for him to recover from his illness, even if the dreamer is not sick. This is evidence that one of his relatives will die soon and if the person finds himself sitting in the place of the dead king in a dream. This is evidence that this man is close to his death and that he will die soon. Ibn Shaheen also explained the vision of the dead king that Almighty God will triumph over his enemies.

title: Seeing herself cleaning a child’s chair in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Also, cleaning feces from clothes differs in meaning and interpretation from cleaning feces from the floor or the toilet in a dream, and through this article from your website gptafser.com/ we will learn about the general meaning of the dream about cleaning a children’s chair. Stay with us. Interpretation of seeing clean feces in a dream for one girl. Dream interpreters say that cleaning feces in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of her repentance from sins and transgressions and purifying her heart from temptations and desires. Cleaning feces from the toilet in a dream is interpreted as fulfilling desires that the dreamer has always tried Achieving it, and God knows best. Washing the anus from feces in a dream is a sign of purity and good conditions. And cleaning animal excrement in a dream, returning the money to its owners. Cleaning a child’s chair in a dream is a sign of weakness and the end of anxiety. And whoever cleans her lover of excrement does what he can do. See also: Seeing a child’s feces in a dream for a married woman. Seeing herself cleaning a child’s chair in a dream for a married woman. Cleaning a child’s chair in a dream indicates that the obstacles that prevent the dreamer from continuing on his path to the future and achieving his desired goals will be overcome. Also, seeing a child’s chair clean is Clothes in a dream indicate that worry, strife, and the shedding of burdens and responsibilities will soon end. Cleaning the excrement of a male child in a dream means escaping from adversity and adversity. Whoever cleans the excrement of a female child in his dream will regain her stolen right. Removing a child’s excrement with water in a dream is a sign of happiness and the death of sadness. And change An infant's diaper in a dream portends the continuation of the disease. When you dream of cleaning a child's feces from the floor, he will overcome obstacles and difficulties. Cleaning the feces from the toilet will end in small problems. If a woman cleans her hands of her feces with water and soap, she will leave taboos and stop committing sins. And whoever sees her husband polluted With feces in a dream, he earns forbidden money. Cleaning the toilet in a dream is a sign of the end of marital problems. Seeing your son’s clothes clean of feces in a dream is a sign of his guidance and good condition. Washing feces in a dream indicates repentance and returning to God. The feeling of disgust when cleaning feces in a dream indicates To humiliation and hardship. And cleaning the excrement of parents with justice and charity towards them. When a married woman sees as if she is cleaning the excrement of a dead person in a dream. He hides the secret of this dead person and reports it well to people, and God knows best. Washing the anus with stones to erase traces of excrement in a dream is interpreted by many excuses and excuses that the dreamer takes to avoid his responsibilities. Interpretation of seeing a cleaning chair in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing himself cleaning waste in a man’s dream indicates effort and hardship to earn lawful money. Cleaning feces with water is a salvation from adversity, God willing. When a man cleans the toilet of feces in a dream, this improves his relationship with his wife and treats her with kindness, gentleness and compassion. On his children. If a man cleans his clothes of feces in a dream, he is trying to erase the mistakes of the past. He gets rid of the bad reputation he had in the world. Cleaning promises

title: Interpretation of a dream about a cat eating my food

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a cat eating my food in a dream. We will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a cat eating my food in a dream, as reported by scholars and translators, not personal diligence and other details. Interpretation of a dream about a cat eating my food in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a cat eating my food in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see that. However, the vision A cat eating meat can lead to evil from her acquaintances, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees a cat eating meat, this may indicate harm and deception, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees a cat eating snake meat, this may be evidence of a promotion at work, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person who He gives a cat in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person who gives a cat in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a famous dead person who wants a big cat may indicate his need to beg, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees an old dead person who wants a colorful cat, this may be a sign of good news, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees a dead person He takes a cat from him, as it may express his will that he wants to carry out, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a sad cat in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a crying cat in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing a crying cat could be a sign of the weakness of the character of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. It can also express About his need for attention and care from those around him, and God knows the unseen. When you see a cat crying, it may indicate a woman’s deception, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a cat laughing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a laughing cat in a dream can indicate a happy life, and God knows the unseen. In case the dreamer sees a cat laughing in a dream. In a dream, this could be evidence of good events, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a pregnant woman sees many cats that she has talked to, perhaps this indicates people trying to harm her, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a cat asking for help in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a cat asking for help in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see that, and with Therefore, seeing a cat begging for food may indicate a call to charity, and God knows the unseen, as it may indicate a call to charity and honoring man, and God knows the unseen. And if the dreamer sees feeding a cat with meat, this may lead to marital infidelity, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a cat hitting a leg in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a cat falling under a leg. In a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a cat colliding with a car in a dream can be evidence of getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. While seeing a cat colliding with a car and dying can express injustice and persecution, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a married woman dreams of being hit by a cat With a car, this may indicate the presence of a problem, and God knows best. If a girl sees in a dream a wild cat colliding with a car, this may express psychological problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a cat attacking my child in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about cats attacking my child in a dream. To see a cat attacking one of the children, but you are trying Chasing her away may indicate that she is a good mother, and God knows the unseen. She can express her justice and care for the first.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about cancer for someone close to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cancer for someone closeThe dreamer often appears discomfort, but is that all, and there are no positive signs of this dream? There is also great positivity on the part of the interpreters according to the details that came in the dream, so let us learn about everything that was said. Interpretation of a dream about cancer for someone close to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about cancer for someone close to you? This horrific disease flows through the body of the person who carries it quickly and eventually leads to... Quickly to the death of life, but its meaning in a dream varies greatly. Very worrying if your relative is already suffering from cancer and this means that he will die soon. Psychologists said in interpreting the dream that he has cancer, the dreamer should take good care of himself, even if he is taking care of families and children, and not neglect them to the extent that he regrets it later When remorse is useless. Use absolutely.In case the person you saw with cancer is a stranger to you, your heart is full of kindness and love for everyone around you and you would like to have the opportunity to provide help to everyone and are often a lovable person. Those around you because of your good morals that make you a role model for others. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by the most important interpretive jurists. Interpretation of a dream about cancer for someone close to Ibn Sirin Perhaps these names have not been applied to diseases in the ages Ancient, but like other diseases that spread through the body to destroy it, it received a share of symbolism in the sayings of Ibn Sirin. It has been said that a woman who cares about her family has cancer in her husband's dream, and it is a sign that she cares about many things that those around her may not see as important. For example, she loves order in her home, but finds her husband and children, for example, in a state of chaos. If the relative is loved by the dreamer, then seeing him means that he will fall into a crisis, and the dreamer must have a prominent role in resolving it, but if the person dies because This disease, this is good news about his good condition and the end of his problems and worries that had burdened him for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about cancer for someone close to a single woman. If a girl sees that one of her friends has this disease in a dream, then she is very neglectful and hopes to spend a lot of time with her, because this A friend is the most loyal and loving person you know, a dream. It may be a warning to maintain your relationship with her and not give in to trying to separate them. In a dream, it is a symbol of the importance of time and its organization in the dreamer’s life, as you can waste a lot of it in vain. Which makes her feel remorse afterward, but if she becomes an organized girl who plans her life well, all the bad things around her will change for the better. If an unmarried woman sees that one of her parents has cancer and has already died, this is evidence of his need for prayers from his family, relatives, and everyone who knows him, The living have forgotten him and no longer remember him. Good deeds after death. It is also expected that the dreamer will feel

Good deeds after death. It is also expected that the dreamer will feel

title: More than 50 interpretations of seeing a lamp in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A detailed interpretation of seeing a lamp in a dream. The interpretation of the vision varies according to the social status of the person who saw the dream and also varies according to the condition of the lamp, its type, size and color. The lamp can express happiness, optimism and success in some cases, and it can indicate sadness and failure in other cases, as the interpretation depends on The intensity of the light it emits, follow the full interpretations. What is the interpretation of a dream about a lamp in a dream? Seeing a lamp in a dream is interpreted by leading scholars and interpreters in the following cases: The dream indicates happiness and stability in life. It indicates achieving progress and success in scientific and practical life if the light is bright. And clearly. A glowing lamp indicates the fulfillment of wishes or the academic achievement of the pioneer. A lit lamp can symbolize a close marriage in the family environment. The dim light of the lamp indicates the failure of the marital relationship or the dissolution of the engagement. The glow of the lamp means that the dreamer is in good health or indicates abundant nutrition. Al-Nabulsi believes that the lamp shows the anxiety that a person suffers from and predicts his approaching end and destruction. Artificial lamps indicate repentance from sins and transgressions. A large lamp shows good morals, righteousness and strength of character. Street lights are good and halal food will come to the person soon. Seeing lanterns is evidence of reputation. The good dreamer. The dim light emanating from an electric lamp in a dream indicates weakness in the dreamer’s thinking, and that he does not have dreams and aspirations that he seeks to achieve. What is the interpretation of a dream about a lamp by Ibn Sirin? The respected scholar explains the vision of a lamp as follows: The lamp that hangs from the sky crosses About the spiritual energy and faith that exists within a person. If it shines with a green light, it indicates the angels who surround the person and protect him. In some cases, the dreamer may face many difficulties in his life. If the lamp burns, the vision expresses exposure to crises, psychological problems, and failure in marriage. Bright lamps in a married man’s dream express happiness in his married life and also indicate a lawful life in the near future. An unmarried young man who sees lamps in his dream represents his approaching marriage to his wife. Good, with good morals and religion. The interpretation of a dream about a lamp in a dream indicates that you are on the right path. Seeing lamps emitting intense bright light and dazzling colors means that the person lives a happy life and will make a lot of profits in his life. What is the interpretation of a dream about a lamp in a dream for a single woman The interpretation of seeing a lamp in a dream varies depending on its shape, the light emanating from it, and how you saw it in the dream. The interpretation is as follows: Seeing lights on is considered beneficial to her life and an indication of her awareness and awareness of all things around her. If a girl sees that a lamp explodes in a dream, this means that she will go through bad circumstances and difficult events in her life. Bright and bright white light in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions. Which indicates happiness and joy in the dreamer’s life. If the bulb explodes, this may...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cats  What is the interpretation of seeing cats in a dream and trying to get them out of the house?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cats in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing cats in a dream and trying to get them out of the house? Interpretation of seeing cats being chased On the All New and Exclusive Moments website, the interpretation of a dream about cats for a virgin is the interpretation of seeing catsInterpretation of a dream of cats miscarrying in a dream A dream of cats miscarrying Interpretation of a dream of a cat miscarrying A dream about cats eating meat Interpretation of dreamsSeeing cats in a dream Interpretation of seeing cats Being kicked out of the house in a dream. A married woman in a dream warns of failure and divorce. A cat in a dream of pregnancy is a sign of the birth of a child, and only God knows. Other indicators of seeing cats in a dream. A cat’s scratching indicates the presence of troubles and troubles in a person’s life. Playing with cats promises to meet someone you love Interpretation of a dream about killing cats means prostitution and oppression. A cat bite warns of problems and troubles. A white cat shows concern about money. A black cat means that there is someone who wants to destroy your life. A gray cat indicates betrayal of one of your family members towards you. A cat’s meow means taking risks and in the most vulnerable situations. It can indicate success and it could be an insulting speech that you hear from a friend. A flying cat symbolizes quarrels and a cat in the house means peace. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cat Nostradamus Nostradamus is one of the most famous French astrologers and scientists. His cat is a model of magic and evil, and the interpretation of the cat is similar based on the dreamer’s feeling and emotion. A cat’s scratch means complexity in the viewer’s life. A black cat with red eyes is a sign of hostility and bad intentions. A big cat is a model of many problems and fears. Meanings of a cat in a dream If you dream that you are selling a cat, this means that he will lose all his money in a project, and God knows best. But If you dream that you are eating your cat, this is a strong indication that you will learn magic. And when you see a black cat in a dream looking at you, this is a sign of marital infidelity. If you see that you are executing a cat in a dream, this indicates hatred and envy. The meaning of seeing a cat in a dreamSeeing a cat According to Ibn Sirin, a male is one of the signs that indicate the presence of a traitor or thief, and it can also symbolize treachery and cruelty. Cats indicate bad luck. A female cat is praiseworthy to look at, and portends goodness, while a hungry cat shows the dreamer’s need, poverty, and helplessness. Cats symbolize To goodness, joy, success, or marriage and pregnancy. White cats indicate the presence of good company, good friends, and a strong connotation of safety and security. Black cats are undesirable because they symbolize deception, cunning, betrayal, and bad intentions. Interpretation of Nostradamus’ vision of the CottonNostradamus is one of the most famous French astrologers and scientists. The cat symbolizes magic and evil, and the interpretation of the cat varies according to the viewer’s emotion and feeling. The cat’s scratching means complexity in the viewer’s life. Cat

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a lion in a house according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lion in his house by Ibn Sirin: Many people are afraid when they see predatory animals in reality and are afraid to approach them or confront them so as not to cause serious damage to their lives, but these predatory animals such as lions can appear in dreams, and in this case the person does not know the meaning of their appearance in it. In this article, we explain the various interpretations in this regard. What is the interpretation of a dream about a lion in the house? The interpretation of a dream about a lion in the house can indicate the death of a god or one of his relatives or symbolize the death of the monarch. The person has suffered from serious injustice around him in the society in which he lives and his suffering to get rid From the state of injustice that torments him. Approaching sour milk in a dream is evidence that he will fall into many difficult problems that will turn his life into the worst situation, but he will be able to learn the correct way to solve all these problems and restore his life as it was before. His attack on man And his resurrection by throwing him to the ground without killing him symbolizes the disease that afflicts him in his body or his exposure to a major crisis in his life such as imprisonment or falling into misfortunes. The dreamer in his dream quarrels with the lion and throws it at him is evidence that God (Glory be to Him) will afflict him in his body with a type of disease that has no cure and he will suffer. Of it for a long time. . But he will not give up his resolve and determination to fight the disease. A lion bite or eating its meat may indicate that he has succeeded in reaching higher ranks or promotions in his field of work, and it may indicate the presence of an unfit person in his life who exposes him to the most dangerous forms. Injustice and aggression. The dreamer riding on his back and feeling extreme fear are things that mean that many major misfortunes will occur in his life and his inability to know the appropriate solution that will save him from these misfortunes. If the fortuneteller rides on his back and does not feel any kind of terror or fear, this is a sign On his victory over one of the enemies who are trying to create difficulties and put him in great trouble. Having sex with him without feeling intimidated or afraid are things that indicate that there is no disease in his body and that he enjoys good health and well-being. His entry into one of the houses where the dreamer was present and he suffers from a type of There is no difficult disease, so the vision means his death soon, and if he does not suffer from the disease, this is a sign of the extent of anxiety. And tension from one of the rulers and their tyranny. What is the interpretation of a dream about a lion in the house by Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of a dream about a lion in his house by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned several situations in which a lion can be seen in a dream and explained each of these situations to us, as we will mention in the following points: Its appearance in the dream It is a sign that a person is trying to get him into trouble and deceive him in everything he does in his life, and he must be careful when dealing with those around him in his life. The fortuneteller standing on his face means that there are many difficulties that he may face and that you will suffer from for a long time. Or it may indicate the death of a family member or close friend. It indicates the exploitation of money and human power with the intention of insulting and harming others. It can symbolize qualities that

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about pink roses from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about picking pink roses, and the interpretation of a dream about giving away pink roses.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pink roses has multiple meanings related to many fields, not only the emotional aspect and burning feelings that occupy the heart of the viewer, but also indicates success and distinction, as the pink rose is rare and distinguishes itself among its peers in the garden. It is the best messenger on most happy and other occasions. Therefore, pink roses often portend auspicious events, but they can also warn of danger or people with bad intentions, depending on the shape and quantity of the roses, the person carrying them, what he does with them, and many other different circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about pink roses. What is the interpretation of a dream about pink roses? Seeing pink roses in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions according to many interpreters. It expresses the steadfast spirit and gentle spirit that the dreamer has and makes him a distinctive personality with rare morals that attracts people to him and gives him a special place in their hearts. Seeing a garden full of pink roses means that the dreamer has many beautiful and purposeful ambitions and dreams that he hopes to achieve in the future and works hard to achieve them. There is an opinion that goes to interpret seeing a person gifted with a very bright pink rose, that it shows that he is a deceitful person who pretends to be innocent and good, but in reality he is He hides a heart full of hate, hate and desire. Palmyra, so the divine must give his trust only to those who deserve it. While there are some opinions that indicate that a person who plants pink roses in a large garden that grows many roses, is about to start his own business project that will bring him abundant profits and great fame. It will spread to different peoples and countries. Interpretation of a dream about pink roses by Ibn Sirin. According to the opinion of the venerable Sheikh Ibn Sirin, seeing pink roses in a dream is one of the best visions that carry good verses and meanings, foretelling an abundance of blessings. Ibn Sirin also believes that pink roses placed in vases at home indicate special occasions. Consecutive happiness that will come to the dreamer in a row and will be a reason for great joy for him to forget the pain of the past that he was exposed to. As for the one who collects pink flowers from the orchards, he works hard to achieve a beloved goal, as long as he wants to reach it and sacrifices a lot for it, and the Lord (Glory be to Him) will reward him for what he does. That's it. And his efforts.To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by the most important interpreters.Interpretation of a dream of pink roses for a single womanInterpreters believe that pink roses for single women carry many good meanings, which are often related to their eventful future Praiseworthy joys and promising news that they have been waiting for to happen for a long time. If a single woman sees someone giving her a vase of pink roses, this means that she will soon marry someone she loves, and with him she will be happy with a happy and stable future life (God willing). In addition, the Choosing a pink rose indicates that the dreamer is holding on to custom

title: Interpretation of being beaten in a dream: Dreaming that someone beats me according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of beating in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman. Either a stranger or someone I know is beaten in the face, the father hits his daughter, the wife hits, the mother hits the daughter. Interpretation of beating in a dream. Striking with a sword in a dream is interpreted as a victory over enemies, and the strike indicates change, and the strike It is well known that hitting wins. Whoever sees in a dream that an angel hit him with a stick, the king will clothe him, and if he hits him on the back, he will pay off his debt on his behalf. If he hits him with his incapacity, he will marry him to a woman, and the beating is interpreted as an engagement, and if he hits him on the skull, the attacker gains whatever he wants. Interprets hitting With supplication, and whoever hits the donkey he is riding should not eat except after asking God and supplicating to Him, and hitting anyone except the woman under his command benefits the striker. Whoever sees himself in a dream being beaten, this is the best proof if the beating was not from the angels or from the dead. Beating with a stick or walking. Harmful because it is made of leather. Whoever strikes or strikes another, it means that he knows that the courtesy of slapping and hitting in a dream is interpreted as a journey. Whoever dreams that he hits the ground means that he will travel. Whoever is flogged in a dream forty lashes has drunk alcohol, and whoever is flogged in a dream with a flogging Eighty lashes is a slander against chaste women. The living person who hits the dead person strengthens his religion, and whoever sees that the dead person hit him will be better off than traveling. Whoever hits him dies, then he pays his debt at his expense, and hitting him without pain or scratch is his clothing in the winter. Hitting the animal he deserves It is disciplining, and hitting an animal that does not deserve aggression and ignorance. And whoever sees that someone has hit him and does not know who he is, he will get money, kindness, and new clothes. Interpretation of hitting in a dream - YouTube
